Title: Novel compressed digital radio fronthaul over photonically-generated THz wireless bridge
Abstract: OFC 2020 © OSA 2020 © 2020 The Author(s)Compressed DRoF-based fronthaul links enable cost-effective last-mile wireless coverage. This paper demonstrates a novel system which carries 12 LTE services over both optical fibre and photonically-generated THz wireless links with over 40 dB dynamic range.
